amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for shipment of radioactive nuclear waste from Ontario, Canada to South Carolina.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Secretary of Energy to carry out, or for the salary of any officer or employee of the Department of Energy to carry out, the proposed action of the Department to transport target residue material from Ontario, Canada to the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Higgins amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Higgins amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Higgins.
